sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>one sided</radical> radical and the <kanji>one sided</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: Think of anything that is <kanji>one sided</kanji>. A battle. A sports game. A relationship. What makes them so one sided? One side always has a <reading>cata</reading>pult (<ja>かた</ja>).
readingInfo: Imagine a one sided situation that you've had. Now imagine the winning side with a catapult. For example, a baseball game where one team is destroying the other. That's because instead of a pitcher, they have a catapult.
